Detailed Description

Positions a content layer relative to some anchor point in a plot space.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithPlotSpace: (CPPlotSpace *)  newPlotSpace
anchorPlotPoint: (NSArray *)  newPlotPoint 

Initializes a newly allocated CPPlotSpaceAnnotation object.

This is the designated initializer. The initialized layer will be anchored to a point in plot coordinates.

Parameters:
newPlotSpace The plot space which the anchor is defined in.
newPlotPoint An array of NSDecimalNumbers giving the anchor plot coordinates.
Returns:
The initialized CPPlotSpaceAnnotation object.
